standard.description: Standard divider for separating content sections
standard.usage: Use between list items, sections, or content blocks

subtle.description: Subtle divider for overlapping frames and edge differentiation
subtle.usage: Use on frame edges when overlapping another frame to create subtle depth separation

notes: Both divider types work for mobile and desktop versions
Standard (#08) is for general content separation
Subtle (#14) is for frame edge differentiation when layering UI elements
